text:
*Today I worked:* from 7.30AM to 6.30 as I went on a trip with the school choir which I run!
*Today tasks / activities I worked on: As it is data week.. i have been working on a plan for the next half term in terms of pupil needs and how to address gaps in learning
*Today my colleague told me: that she appreciates me and that she is the luckiest TA to have me as her teacher
*Today I'm learning / reading:* about how to meet the needs of all pupils to develop their writing
*Today I felt: very proud of my pupils during the choir concert!!
